extends Object
implements Cloneable

      • computeAttackPathForAnANDVertex

        private List<AttackPath> computeAttackPathForAnANDVertex(List<List<AttackPath>> parentsAttackPathList,
                                               int indexInPath)
        [OR] List [OR] List [OR] List PARENT1 PARENT2 PARENT3

        AND LEAF : PARENT1.1 AND PARENT2.1 AND PARENT 3.1 OR PARENT 1.2 AND PARENT2.1 AND PARENT3.A OR ....

        Parameters:
        parentsAttackPathList - the list of list of possible attack path of parents of a "AND" node in the attack graph :
        indexInPath - the index if this list
        Returns:
        the list of possible attack path
